description:
yt-dlp is a youtube-dl fork based on the now inactive youtube-dlc. The main focus of this project is adding new features and patches while also keeping up to date with the original project
    
## Notes
  
- Optional dependency package: [ffmpeg](/packages/ffmpeg) (for stream extraction and conversion support)
- This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is
out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: A youtube-dl fork with additional features and fixes
author: https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/blob/master/CONTRIBUTORS
